Title: Scooby-Doo and the Samurai Sword
Genre: Animation, Action, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Mystery
Actors: Frank Welker, Casey Kasem, Mindy Cohn, Grey Griffin
Plot: The Mystery Inc. crew travels the globe on a transcontinental treasure hunt to solve a series of ancient riddles. Scooby-Doo and Shaggy are indoctrinated by an unlikely Sword Master.
